welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Middleton, where small-town charm meets scenic beauty. Get ready to explore our quaint shops, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our charming city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Capital City Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Harrisburg International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
